title: Verify Phase 5: end-to-end run monitoring test
description:
Verify all Phase 5 features work together.

Test scenarios:
1. Start a run with ticker, verify SSE stream works
2. Verify .live.json updates are broadcast to tickboard
3. Verify tool activity appears in UI
4. Verify metrics update in real-time
5. Verify run completion finalizes correctly
6. Verify run history shows in drawer
7. Test with multiple concurrent epic runs

Acceptance:
- Can watch an epic run in real-time via tickboard
- Output streams without significant delay
- Tool activity shows current tool with timing
- Metrics update as tokens are consumed
- Run history is accessible after completion
